Song.title: You Are So Good To Me

Arrangement.text:
Intro: G - C (2x) Verse 1: [G]You are so good to me You [C]heal my broken heart You [G]are my Father in [C]Heaven. (2x)
Chorus: You are [G]beautiful my sweet sweet so[C]ng You are [G]beautiful my sweet sweet so[C]ng You are [G]beautiful my sweet sweet so[C]ng I will sing again [G C]
Verse 2: You [G]ride upon the clouds You [C]lead me to the truth You [G]are the Spirit insid[C]e me. (2x)
{new_page} Bridge: [D]You are my [C]strong [G]melody [D]You are my [C]dancing [G]rhythm [D]You are my [C]perfect [G]rhyme And I [Em]want to sing [D]forever
Chorus: You are [G]beautiful my sweet sweet so[C]ng You are [G]beautiful my sweet sweet so[C]ng You are [G]beautiful my sweet sweet so[C]ng I will sing again [G C]
Verse 3: [G]You poured out all your blood You [C]died upon the cross You [G]are my Jesus who love[C]s me.
Tag: You [G]are my Father in [C]Heaven You [G]are the Spirit insid[C]e me You [G]are my Jesus who love[C]s me
Arrangement.searchtext: intro g c 2x verse 1 you are so good to me you heal my broken heart you are my father in heaven 2x chorus you are beautiful my sweet sweet song you are beautiful my sweet sweet song you are beautiful my sweet sweet song i will sing again verse 2 you ride upon the clouds you lead me to the truth you are the spirit inside me 2x bridge you are my strong melody you are my dancing rhythm you are my perfect rhyme and i want to sing forever chorus you are beautiful my sweet sweet song you are beautiful my sweet sweet song you are beautiful my sweet sweet song i will sing again verse 3 you poured out all your blood you died upon the cross you are my jesus who loves me tag you are my father in heaven you are the spirit inside me you are my jesus who loves me
